attributes.additional_details: Keeping the 6 nations rugby on terrestrial TV, over the years Sky and now BT are taking over all the sport we loved as kids growing up, Football, Cricket, F1, Pro 12 and premiership rugby, Ashes, Lions. I know these companies command millions but the every day man wants to watch the best rugby tournament on terrestrial TV. We need this government to step in to keep the 6 nations for the fans not the Fat Cats.
